friction_classification_summary.friction: Multi-Entity Jurisdictional Fragmentation (Operational Silos, Duplicative Overhead)
Private Cloud Revenue Realization Lag (8-20 Weeks Procurement/Deployment/Migration)
evidence_sources: Stage 2.2 Private Cloud fixed infrastructure (CapEx model)

friction_classification_summary.friction: Customer Churn Leakage (Estimated 20-25% Annual Gross Churn)
evidence_sources: Stage 2.1 revenue declining 7% YoY despite bookings growth 14%

friction_classification_summary.friction: Sales-to-Delivery Handoff (Knowledge Transfer, Expectation Mismatch, Re-Discovery)
evidence_sources: Stage 2.2 organizational fragmentation (sales vs delivery incentives)

friction_classification_summary.friction: FedRAMP Authorization Gating (3-12 Month ATO Process Delays Government Revenue)
VMware Vendor Lock-In + Broadcom Cost Shock (200-300% Price Increases, Migration Infeasible)
evidence_sources: Stage 1.3 VMware platform dependency (historical path dependency)

friction_classification_summary.friction: Hyperscaler Partner Credit Dependency (Public Cloud Margin Hostage to AWS/Azure/Google)
evidence_sources: Stage 2.1 Public Cloud 10.4% margin dependent on partner credits 5-15%
Stage 2.2 no control over hyperscaler programs

friction_classification_summary.friction: Fixed Infrastructure Underutilization (Private Cloud Declining 13% Creating Stranded Capacity)
evidence_sources: Stage 2.2 fixed infrastructure costs (depreciation, facilities) create negative leverage
